name: feature-detect-es6
description: Detect which ES6 features are available.
readme: [![view on npm](http://img.shields.io/npm/v/feature-detect-es6.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/feature-detect-es6) [![npm module downloads per month](http://img.shields.io/npm/dm/feature-detect-es6.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/feature-detect-es6) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/75lb/feature-detect-es6.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/75lb/feature-detect-es6) [![Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/75lb/feature-detect-es6.svg)](https://david-dm.org/75lb/feature-detect-es6) [![js-standard-style](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-standard-brightgreen.svg)](https://github.com/feross/standard) ## feature-detect-es6 Detect which ES6 features are available. **Example** ```js var detect = require('feature-detect-es6') if (detect.all('class', 'spread', 'let', 'arrowFunction')){ // safe to run ES6 code natively.. } else { // run your transpiled ES5.. } ``` * [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) * [.class()](#module_feature-detect-es6.class) ⇒ boolean * [.arrowFunction()](#module_feature-detect-es6.arrowFunction) ⇒ boolean * [.let()](#module_feature-detect-es6.let) ⇒ boolean * [.const()](#module_feature-detect-es6.const) ⇒ boolean * [.newArrayFeatures()](#module_feature-detect-es6.newArrayFeatures) ⇒ boolean * [.collections()](#module_feature-detect-es6.collections) ⇒ boolean * [.generators()](#module_feature-detect-es6.generators) ⇒ boolean * [.promises()](#module_feature-detect-es6.promises) ⇒ boolean * [.templateStrings()](#module_feature-detect-es6.templateStrings) ⇒ boolean * [.symbols()](#module_feature-detect-es6.symbols) ⇒ boolean * [.destructuring()](#module_feature-detect-es6.destructuring) ⇒ boolean * [.spread()](#module_feature-detect-es6.spread) ⇒ boolean * [.all()](#module_feature-detect-es6.all) ⇒ boolean ### detect.class() ⇒ boolean Returns true if the `class` statement is available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.arrowFunction() ⇒ boolean Returns true if the arrow functions available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.let() ⇒ boolean Returns true if the `let` statement is available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.const() ⇒ boolean Returns true if the `const` statement is available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.newArrayFeatures() ⇒ boolean Returns true if the [new Array features](http://exploringjs.com/es6/ch_arrays.html) are available (exluding `Array.prototype.values` which has zero support anywhere). **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.collections() ⇒ boolean Returns true if `Map`, `WeakMap`, `Set` and `WeakSet` are available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.generators() ⇒ boolean Returns true if generators are available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.promises() ⇒ boolean Returns true if `Promise` is available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.templateStrings() ⇒ boolean Returns true if template strings are available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.symbols() ⇒ boolean Returns true if `Symbol` is available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.destructuring() ⇒ boolean Returns true if destructuring is available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.spread() ⇒ boolean Returns true if the spread operator (`...`) is available. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) ### detect.all() ⇒ boolean Returns true if *all* specified features are detected. **Kind**: static method of [feature-detect-es6](#module_feature-detect-es6) | Param | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | [...feature] | string | the features to detect. | **Example** ```js var result = detect.all('class', 'spread', 'let', 'arrowFunction') ``` * * * © 2015 Lloyd Brookes \<75pound@gmail.com\>.
